localizations.ANVIL_LORE:
%gray%Place this anvil anywhere in the world
%gray%to start reforging items!
%dark_gray%Use /reforginginfo or /ri for details!
localizations.UPDATE_CHECKER_MESSAGE: A new update is available! Use /updatereforging to update.
localizations.RAGE_DESCRIPTION:
%gray%Gives you strength 2 for 5 seconds
%gray%but reflects 25% of the damage
%gray%you deal!
localizations.SHIELD_DESCRIPTION:
%gray%Makes you invincible to mobs and players
%gray%but also prevents you from attacking them!
localizations.FREEZE_DESCRIPTION:
%gray%Throws a snowball that freezes the
%gray%hit entity for 5 seconds!
localizations.TELEPORT_DESCRIPTION:
%gray%Teleports you in your looking direction
%gray%up to 4 blocks!
localizations.EXPLOSION_DESCRIPTION:
%gray%Creates an explosion around you without
%gray%destroying the block below you!
localizations.REVEAL_DESCRIPTION:
%gray%Reveals all invisible mobs and players
%gray%within ten blocks!
localizations.STORM_DESCRIPTION:
%gray%Summons a circle of lighting bolts
%gray%around you!
localizations.PAWN_DESCRIPTION:
%gray%Summons two zombies with 150% of the
%gray%health of a normal one attacking
%gray%other players for 10 seconds!
localizations.SEISMIC_WAVE_DESCRIPTION:
%gray%Damages and knocks back all mobs and
%gray%players within five blocks!
localizations.FIRE_DESCRIPTION:
%gray%Summons a vortex of fire that ignites
%gray%everyone on its way for 5 seconds!
localizations.THORNS_DESCRIPTION:
%gray%Reflects 25% of the damage you receive
%gray%for 5 seconds!
localizations.THROW_DESCRIPTION:
%gray%Throws your weapon for 2 seconds
%gray%dealing 75% of its damage!
localizations.FLY_DESCRIPTION:
%gray%Boosts you in your looking direction
%gray%and makes you glide as if you were
%gray%wearing elytra!
localizations.SPECTATE_DESCRIPTION:
%gray%Gives you spectator mode for 5 seconds
%gray%but returns you to your initial location!
localizations.WITHERED_STONE_LORE:
%gray%Use this item on a reforging anvil to
%gray%obtain %light_purple%Withered %reset%%gray%reforge!
localizations.SPECTACULAR_STONE_LORE:
%gray%Use this item on a reforging anvil to
%gray%obtain %red%Spectacular %reset%%gray%reforge!
localizations.SUPERIOR_STONE_LORE:
%gray%Use this item on a reforging anvil to
%gray%obtain %gold%Superior %reset%%gray%reforge!
localizations.MURDEROUS_STONE_LORE:
%gray%Use this item on a reforging anvil to
%gray%obtain %red%Murderous %reset%%gray%reforge!
localizations.TITANIC_STONE_LORE:
%gray%Use this item on a reforging anvil to
%gray%obtain %green%Titanic %reset%%gray%reforge!
localizations.EXPLOSIVE_STONE_LORE:
%gray%Use this item on a reforging anvil to
%gray%obtain %red%Explosive %reset%%gray%reforge!
localizations.PUPPETEER_STONE_LORE:
%gray%Use this item on a reforging anvil to
%gray%obtain %green%Puppeteer %reset%%gray%reforge!
